items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love! Perfect for a party
items.body: I bought a medium in navy. I am 5’5”, 170lb, and usually where M/L. I am very small chested and have wider hips. Fit well! I love that it has adjustable straps for extra sure fit. It is stretchy around the bra line but the waist has no give. Measure accordingly. The fabric was very very nice thick satin and looks well made and high quality. I fabric was a big hot but not bad. This was worn for a Christmas party but is great for summer too. It was easy to wear and I was comfortable all evening. Highly recommend. Wish I got it in black! Read more
items.author: Cbp11

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress
items.body: I wore this for a wedding it was amazing it fit great and comfortable great value and style I got many compliments on it can’t wait to wear it again Read more
items.author: yessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful dress
items.body: Bought this dress last minute for an anniversary banquet and was not disappointed. It's beautiful, the color (dark teal/green) rich and luxurious, the material thick and not cheap looking, and it fit beautifully (i got a size small, I'm 5'4, 140 lb 32C, 27/28 in waist, 4-6 dress). It was flattering and sexy sophisticated. I literally dropped a cake on my lap with white icing all over it. I was able to wipe it off and you couldn't tell. Loved it Read more
items.author: JLQ

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: This dress is not how it looks in the picture. I returned it sadly. Very heavy and thick and kind of a difficult material. I have no boobs really but I have an athletic body so finding clothing is really difficult. This dress didn’t fit me anywhere. The chest was so big too and I got a medium! It might have been comfortable. I liked the color so much too. More money than what it’s worth tho sadly. The value for money isn’t there with this dress. Read more
items.author: Leslie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, pretty, but not for curvy girls
items.body: This dress was really pretty, the color was deep and the fabric was soft, but it did not look flattering on me. I have a short torso, so it was hard to figure out where the top part should sit. It ended up making my chest look small and my hips boxy. For a more petite person I bet it would look great! Read more
items.author: Lo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good wedding guest dress
items.body: Good dress, the first one I ordered had a stuck zipper. Second one I oredered fit and is cute! Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: It’s a beautiful dress. I’m 4’11” though and it’s sits almost to the floor lol I guess it’s ok with tall enough heels. It has a nice satin feel and weight to it. Doesn’t feel cheap at all. I feel it’s worth the money. Adjustable straps. I only returned it because I found a dress at the mall and I liked it better for the occasion. (Wedding) I was hesitant on what sizing to get. I’m 137lbs, 34” waist and I’m usually a between size M-L. Amazon recommended a L and it fit perfectly. It has some stretch to it. Read more
items.author: Jharline

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress!
items.body: This dress is beautiful. I ordered the blush pink color and it was perfect for the wedding. The material is really nice and it has some weight to the dress. It’s not a thin shiny material. I let my bathroom steam up to get the wrinkles out of the bottom because I didn’t want to iron it. The steamer probably would’ve worked as well as long as you don’t get the steam too close to the dress. Also know this is not addressed that you can dry clean or put in the dryer. Your hand wash and hang to dry according to the label. I ordered the XL and I’m usually a 14/16. I really want to order the green and the black. This is the dress you want in your closet. This dress will get a lot of wear. You won’t regret ordering. I’ve paid way more for dress that I didn’t like as much as this one. Read more
items.author: Gabrielle Whitfield

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Burgundy, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
